text:
I’m really struggling with understanding the docs and getting things set up properly. I’ve been trying to use Makie, and I repeatedly get this error:
`ERROR: UndefVarError: isnothing not defined`.

I’ve tried adding `Makie`, `GLMakie`, and `AbstractPlotting`, but no matter which example from the tutorial I run in the REPL, the error shows up after calling any plotting function (eg, `scatter`, `arrows`). Can anyone help me get this set up?

elements.text: I’m really struggling with understanding the docs and getting things set up properly. I’ve been trying to use Makie, and I repeatedly get this error:
, but no matter which example from the tutorial I run in the REPL, the error shows up after calling any plotting function (eg,
). Can anyone help me get this set up?

text: Yea, it sounds like you're using Julia 1.0, whereas `isnothing` was added in 1.1. For the latest version of Makie, you need at least Julia 1.3 anyway.

elements.text: Yea, it sounds like you're using Julia 1.0, whereas
was added in 1.1. For the latest version of Makie, you need at least Julia 1.3 anyway.

text: you’re right - I just removed and reinstalled Julia, and I think it was on an older version. No idea how that happened tbh. Thank you

elements.text: you’re right - I just removed and reinstalled Julia, and I think it was on an older version. No idea how that happened tbh. Thank you

text: You will be probably better of using Julia v1.5.3 and jumping on v1.6 when it comes out of beta and is officially release (soon as far as I understand)
